nodes.text: Deer were herbivorous[source?] four-legged animals found in the oro woods of Alderaan. They were small creatures, colored bright red with golden stripes. They fed on shoots in the undergrowth of the ancient forests. The Orowood botanical garden at Coruscant also had an oro wood forest with deer. In 8 ABY, New Republic diplomat Leia Organa and Prince Isolder toured the garden while the deer were grazing.
The Gallaze, a quadrupedal herbivore native to the planet Trinta, were noted to be like deer.
Deer first appeared in the 1994 novel The Courtship of Princess Leia.
